description:
When the Keroro Platoon participates in a quiz show hosted by Dasonu Maso, they learn the value of teamwork... or is it every frog for himself? Later, Keroro and company are annoyed when the pacifistic Dororo shoots down even their mildest plans to invade Pekopon, so they change his personality to be more agreeable, but (naturally) get more than they asked for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Attack! Hint Age Difference Ultra Hammer / Dororo, Big Change!
ケロロ アタック! ヒントで年の差ウルトラハンマー / ドロロ 大改造!
